title: Colour
creator_credit: Christa van Santen, Nico Crama and Color Film Center
brief_description: Explores the use of colour in art and nature; discusses the concept of colour as the reflection and absorption of white light; explains the significance of hue, value, chroma, and complementary colours; and examines the illusions, emotional impact, and optical effects of colour. Animation: Ronald Raaijmakers. Commentary: Mart Ambry.
